scene.name: intro
scene.line: A line of cars extends down the road in a late-night traffic jam. Conway and Shannon can faintly see and hear some construction on the road ahead.

option.insertedText: They get out of the truck and walk ahead.

scene.option: Get out of the truck and walk ahead.

scene.name: walk-ahead
scene.line: Most of the drivers in line are reading magazines, or lightly dozing.

option.insertedText: Conway and Shannon walk further ahead.
Conway and Shannon try to start up a conversation.

scene.option: Try to start up a conversation.
Return to the truck and drive away.

scene.name: conversation
scene.line: Conway taps on a window, trying to get an older woman's attention. She snaps awake suddenly, but ignores him, focusing on a point just ahead on the highway.

scene.name: walk-ahead-2
scene.line: The road ends abruptly. A small crew of highway maintenance workers have been laying down a ten-foot stretch of road. They complete their project and step out of the way, as traffic briefly resumes. The cars stop again, and the maintenance workers begin on the next section.
